T02TD2921E:318b-1: badzra bi d'a ra na karma tsa tu: s'a dha na ka la sha bi dhi:/
T02TD2921E:318b-3: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las bzhi sgrub pa'i bum pa'i cho ga / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2921E:318b-4: gang zhig rang lha legs bsnyen pas //
T02TD2921E:318b-5: bum pa'i cho ga zhi la sogs //
T02TD2921E:318b-6: las bzhi mngon par bsgrub 'dod pas //
T02TD2921E:318b-7: las mthun gnas su brtsam par bya //
T02TD2921E:318b-8: zhi la dngul dang rgyas la gser //
T02TD2921E:318b-9: dbang la zangs te drag po lcags //
T02TD2921E:318b-10: yang na kham pa'am shing yang rung //
T02TD2921E:318b-11: las mthun kha dog can du bya //
T02TD2921E:318b-12: las mthun ras kyis mgul pa dkri //
T02TD2921E:318b-13: dge ba'i shing ngam gdug pa can //
T02TD2921E:318b-14: las dang mthun pas kha brgyan te //
T02TD2921E:318b-15: su ru bha ti tsandan dkar //
T02TD2921E:318b-16: dmar dang 'bru sman rin chen lnga //
T02TD2921E:318b-17: rgyun 'bab chus bkang las gsum la'o //
T02TD2921E:318b-18: drag po aa gar nag po dang //
T02TD2921E:318b-19: gu gul rgyun bral chu yis dgang //
T02TD2921E:318b-20: rang lha'i bsam gtan ldan pa yis //
T02TD2921E:318b-21: bum par las mthun lha bskyed de //
T02TD2921E:318b-22: ye shes mchod pa gnyis med bstim //
T02TD2921E:318b-23: slar yang mchod de bstod mnyes bya //
T02TD2921E:318b-24: sngags bzlas zhi la dkar ba yis //
T02TD2921E:318b-25: 'od zer bsil ba rnam par spros //
T02TD2921E:318b-26: rgyas la btso ma'i gser 'od dang //
T02TD2921E:318b-27: dbang la padma r'a ga'i mdog / drag po la 'od kha dog nag / dri nga gdung ba bskyed pa yis //
T02TD2921E:318b-28: gang reg nad dang gson sdig zhi //
T02TD2921E:318b-29: tshe dang stobs 'phel longs spyod rgyas //
T02TD2921E:319a-0: @319a * // dbang du byed dang tshar gcod par //
T02TD2921E:319a-1: bsgom dang bzlas la sh'antim dang //
T02TD2921E:319a-2: pushtim wa sham m'a ra ya //
T02TD2921E:319a-4: ji srid mngon par 'dod pa yis //
T02TD2921E:319a-5: bzlas pa rdzogs mthar lha 'od zhu //
T02TD2921E:319a-6: sngags kyi chu yis gang bkrus pa //
T02TD2921E:319a-8: dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las bzhi sgrub pa'i bum pa'i cho ga / pandi ta chen po dzny'a na shr'is mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2921E:319a-10: // / pandi ta dzny'a na shr'i dang /
T02TD2921E:319a-11: lo ts'a ba rab zhis bsgyur ba'o//
